attributes.action: Require every game  animal to be tagged to identify the source of the game so damage liability can be placed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year thousands of motorists face the cost of repairs due to irresposible containment of game birds.  I require every animal used/killed for the purpose of sport be tagged to allow the liability of damage caused to property and or person(s)be rightfully claimed under law
